instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3437 Works fine when boot from USB drive but not internal ssd drives?
threads.message: i tried 3 different drive i reset nvram i formatted the drive in both formats i tries installing high sierra and catalina no luck it works from usb drive with high sierra and i can go to diskutil and see ssd i can even use carbon copy to install but won't reboot can't see ssd from boot

threads.title: 820-3437 Works fine when boot from USB drive but not internal ssd drives?
820-3437 Works fine when boot from USB drive but not internal ssd drives?
threads.message: thank for reply it was the hard drive i had to flash it then it work
